[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/node-core-library](./node-core-library.md) &gt; [ITerminal](./node-core-library.iterminal.md)

## ITerminal interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ITerminal 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [registerProvider(provider)](./node-core-library.iterminal.registerprovider.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Subscribe a new terminal provider. |
|  [unregisterProvider(provider)](./node-core-library.iterminal.unregisterprovider.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Unsubscribe a terminal provider. If the provider isn't subscribed, this function does nothing. |
|  [write(messageParts)](./node-core-library.iterminal.write.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Write a generic message to the terminal |
|  [writeDebug(messageParts)](./node-core-library.iterminal.writedebug.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Write a debug-level message. |
|  [writeDebugLine(messageParts)](./node-core-library.iterminal.writedebugline.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Write a debug-level message followed by a newline. |
|  [writeError(messageParts)](./node-core-library.iterminal.writeerror.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Write an error message to the console with red text. |
|  [writeErrorLine(messageParts)](./node-core-library.iterminal.writeerrorline.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Write an error message to the console with red text, followed by a newline. |
|  [writeLine(messageParts)](./node-core-library.iterminal.writeline.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Write a generic message to the terminal, followed by a newline |
|  [writeVerbose(messageParts)](./node-core-library.iterminal.writeverbose.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Write a verbose-level message. |
|  [writeVerboseLine(messageParts)](./node-core-library.iterminal.writeverboseline.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Write a verbose-level message followed by a newline. |
|  [writeWarning(messageParts)](./node-core-library.iterminal.writewarning.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Write a warning message to the console with yellow text. |
|  [writeWarningLine(messageParts)](./node-core-library.iterminal.writewarningline.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Write a warning message to the console with yellow text, followed by a newline. |
